```{r}
library(lterdatasampler)
library(tidyverse)
library(themeAnnie)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = pie_crab, aes(x = size, y = water_temp)) + geom_point() + theme_outdoors()+
labs(title = "Crab water temp vs Size", caption = "this is my caption")
#Wow, look at this graph!
```

```{r}
pie_crab_summary <- pie_crab %>%group_by(site) %>% 
  summarize(mean_size = round(mean(size, na.rm = TRUE, 2)),
            sd_size_mm = sd(size, na.rm = TRUE),
            sample_size = n()
            )
  
```
